messages.message:
The user query going to the intent classification is somehow getting transformed to this query: `What regions are responsible for the most revenue?`
Are we doing something to the query before it goes to single-step-pipelines?
```2024-09-12T17:13:18.165611314Z stdout F level=INFO time=2024-09-12 17:13:18,165 msg="Intent Classification: general_query -> What regions are responsible for the most revenue?"  path="/model-service/py/instabase/ibllm/model/utils.py:119" process="MainProcess" thread="ThreadPoolExecutor-579_0" trace_id="4bb1367d163bb821"```
Does the agent framework modify the prompt? @Gaurav Saini
Yeah it seems like agent framework is modifying the user prompt
hey, yeah it modifies the prompt to factor in the email tool. Raising a PR to make the email tool `IB_OPT_IN`, that would fix it for anyone who hasn't explicitly enabled it while we fix this issue.
